In England, in the seven days to 09 May, there were 13,136 new confirmed cases (23.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 May, there were 12,177 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% (959 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 May is 3,884,402 (6,901.1 cases per 100,000 population).
